Hey human! Welcome to the humans.txt file. of zinzy.website.
For more information on my website and how I built it,
see https://www.zinzy.website/colophon

─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

/* TEAM */

Zinzy Waleson Geene
- Role: designer, developer
- Location: Amsterdam, the Netherlands
- Contact: https://www.zinzy.website/contact
- Mastodon: https://tech.lgbt/@zinzy

─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

/* THANKS */

In designing and building this website, I've found endless 
help and inspiration on the Internet. There are countless people
on StackOverflow who've managed to push my efforts forward.
In particular, the people below have a special place in my heart:
 
- Derek Kedziora            https://derekkedziora.com
- Harry Cresswell           https://harrycresswell.com 
- Maxime Vaillancourt       https://maximevaillancourt.com

- Simone Silvestroni        https://simonesilvestroni.com

- Tania Rascia              https://taniarascia.com
